Package com.example.cmput301.view

Class Summary
AnnotationInputView View Class used to get annotation (as a String) from a user after a photo has been taken.
EnlargedPhotoView Simple activity class that takes in a Bitmap photo from its parent class (PhotoResponseView) and displays it on the screen in larger form.
IndividualTaskView This class is responsible for displaying the selected task that was selected via MainActivity.
MainActivity The main screen of our application, which consists mainly of a list of tasks.
PhotoResponseView View class used to display the photo type tasks and to show their photo responses.
PictureSelectionView View class used to hold temporary images taken by the camera.
ResponseView  
TextAdapter  
TextResponseView This class is a type of response view, it is responsible for getting input from the user in the form of text and adds it as a response to the selected task.
